node.title: Gunshots allegedly fired in remote NT community
node.alt: A red dirt road with the Peppimenarti community in the background.
node.description: Police are responding to reports of serious unrest and gunshots being fired in the community of Peppimenarti, south-west of Darwin, which has been struggling with reports of violence for months.
node.content: ["Northern Territory police\u00a0say there are\u00a0reports of gunshots being fired\u00a0in the community of Peppimenarti, 325 kilometres south-west of Darwin, with extra officers being sent to the community to try to\u00a0help calm the situation.", "During today's COVID-19 update press conference, NT Police Commissioner Jamie Chalker said officers had to be diverted from duties in\u00a0Katherine to travel\u00a0to the community where\u00a0\"significant unrest\" has been reported.", "Commissioner Chalker said police understood the trouble related\u00a0to ongoing family disputes in the community.", "\"We've had reports of shots being fired there this morning,\" he said.", "\"It is unfortunate there has been ongoing family disputes and we need families to understand [there] are far greater issues presenting now.\"", "There have been no reports of any injuries so far.", "\"We don't need to be caught up in these family fights and disputes,\" Commissioner Chalker\u00a0said.", "\"Please, everyone, take a breath, calm down and return home.", "\"Let us establish order in the community.\"", "In June, a prominent Aboriginal artist from Peppimenarti called for police and the NT government to help restore safety to the community and said the violence was preventing children from attending school.", "Commissioner Chalker said some essential services in the community had been suspended.", "\"I've surged additional police there.\u00a0They are working with the health resources on the ground and I understand West Daly have said they are suspending services on the ground,\" he said.", "West Daly is the regional council in charge of delivering services in the community of Peppimenarti, which is home to around 220 people.", "The council has been contacted for comment."]
